claim: German had less than 13,200 coronavirus cases with less than 32 deaths as of 19th March 2020 due to the pandemic .
truth: As of 19 March 2020 , Germany has reported 13,083 cases and 31 deaths , for a case fatality rate of approximately 0.2 % .

claim: Maxthon has been downloaded more than 450 million times worldwide .
truth: Maxthon is reported to be the second most popular browser in China , and it has been downloaded more than 500 million times worldwide.

claim: Scary Movie 5 is a stand-alone film because it has a different story-line from the ones established in the previous four films .
truth: It was released on April 12 , 2013.As a stand-alone film , Scary Movie 5 is the first and only installment of the franchise not to feature Cindy Campbell ( played by Anna Faris ) or Brenda Meeks ( Regina Hall ) , nor does it build on the storyline established in the previous four films .

claim: Since 2016 , the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim are called simply the `` Los Angeles Angels '' .
truth: The deal was never finalized , though as of 2017 , most official sources omit the `` of Anaheim '' suffix and the official MLB Style Guide has referred to the team as simply the Los Angeles Angels since the 2016 season.

claim: Pacific Rim original anime will come in 2019 on Netflix .
truth: In November of 2018 it was announced that pacific rim will come as an original anime Netflix that could come some time in 2019 , < /ref >

claim: There were more than 395,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide by March 24 , 2020 .
truth: As of 24 March , more than 396,000 cases of COVID-19 have been reported in more than 190 countries and territories , resulting in more than 17,200 deaths and more than 103,000 recoveries .

claim: By mid-April 2020 , more than 300 COVID-19 cases had been reported in Albania due to the pandemic .
truth: As of 13 April 2020 , there are 467 confirmed cases with COVID-19 in Albania.

claim: All incoming travel from the European Union 's Schengen Area to the US has been canceled for 30 days since March 3 , 2020 , due to the coronavirus pandemic .
truth: On March 11 , 2020 , a proclamation was issued to suspend incoming travel by foreign nationals who have been to a country within the European Union 's Schengen Area ( an area of 26 European states with no border control for those travelling within them .

claim: After Mike Pence announced the lack of tests , Stephen Han committed to producing almost a million tests during the week of March 5 , 2020 , due to the coronavirus pandemic .
truth: On March 5 , Vice President Mike Pence , the leader of the coronavirus response team , acknowledged that `` we do n't have enough tests '' to meet the predicted future demand ; this announcement came only three days after FDA commissioner Stephen Hahn committed to producing nearly a million tests by that week .

claim: The film Trolls ’ soundtrack album was the year 's tenth highest-selling album in the United States with more than 520,000 copies sold in 2017 .
truth: In the United States , it has sold 573,000 copies by April 2017 , and was the year 's tenth highest selling album in the country with 522,000 sold throughout 2017.The lead single , `` Ca n't Stop the Feeling ! ''

claim: All more than 15 2020 UCI World Tour races scheduled to take place up to May , except two , were called off due to the COVID-19 pandemic .
truth: Of the following eleven 2020 UCI World Tour races scheduled to take place up to 11 April , only Paris–Nice , which also had the final day of racing removed , took place at the intended time .

claim: By 3 April , there were countries and territories in Africa with 0 cases of coronavirus .
truth: As of 4 April , only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections : Africa

claim: Boats are forbidden from landing on Herm from outside the Bailiwick until the end of April due to coronavirus .
truth: Subsequently on 19 March individual operators cancelled all cruise trips until the start of may , including nine scheduled to visit the island in April and three in May . On 21 March it was announced that in following directives from the States of Guernsey , no boats are permitted to land on Herm from outside the Bailiwick until at least the end of April .

claim: On October 22 , 1969 , during a World Cup qualifier match , Jimmy Johnstone scored one goal with his team Scotland , losing 3-2 to Germany .
truth: Johnstone continued to play only sporadically for Scotland , and did n't score his next international goal until 22 October 1969 in a World Cup qualifier away against West Germany , Scotland losing 3-2.In May 1974 , during the build-up to the 1974 FIFA World Cup and days before a British Home Championship match against England at Hampden , Johnstone and his other Scotland team-mates took part in a drinking session at their hotel in Largs , Ayrshire .

claim: The film has earned more than $ 142 million in theaters and home video .
truth: Filmed for only $ 2.8 million , it is one of the most profitable movies in history , garnering an estimated gross of more than $ 142 million in the form of theatrical rentals and home video , not including merchandising .
